summary: Two of the screen's finest comic actors, Dudley Moore and Mary Steenburgen, star as successful writing partners whose timing is perfect on stage but amusingly pathetic in their love life. In HD.
cast: Dudley Moore|Mary Steenburgen|Frances Sternhagen|Janet Eilber|Robyn Douglass|Ron Leibman|Rozsika Halmos|Alexander Lockwood|Erica Hiller|Sean Patrick Guérin|Dick Wieand|Brass Adams|Stephen Roberts|Santos Morales|Fran Bennett|George Tyne|Tom Kubiak|Karen Raskind|Allan Kolman|Carole Hemingway|Stanley Ralph Ross|June Sanders|Darrah Meley|Rochelle Robertson
keywords: agent|wedding|bare chested male|man takes off his pants|playwright
title: En íntima colaboración
